Wisdom is the part of our mind that makes it understand meaningful objects. Wisdom necessarily leads to happiness, whereas intelligence can be used for harmful actions. For example, with wisdom we will know the right things to say to console somebody, whereas with intelligence we might know the best way to steal food from the grocery store!<ref>Geshe Kelsang Gyatso, How to Understand the Mind</ref>
